<p><strong>Undergraduate Dissertation</strong> | University of Southampton<br>
<em>2023–2024</em></p>
<p><strong>Title:</strong> Plastic Pollution in Beach Sediments at the Mouth of the Exe Estuary, Devon<br>
<strong>Supervisor:</strong> Dr Victoria Dominguez Almela</p>
<ul>
  <li>Produced a literature review, detailing existing knowledge and identifying research gaps.</li>
  <li>Organised and carried out a field study, sampling beach sediments at three beaches (20 samples per site, 3 survey repeats).</li>
  <li>Processed and analysed 180 samples, documenting 981 collected plastics.</li>
  <li>Analysed spatial/temporal variation and key sources/transport mechanisms.</li>
  <li>Communicated results through text, charts, tables, maps, and photographs.</li>
</ul>
